attributes.action: Stop Gavin Williamson being offered a knighthood
attributes.additional_details: This is a 'keep quiet' offernot based on performance - remember the exam chaos nor on the abidance by the rules of the country - this is the PM buying silence and we will not allow that to happen
attributes.background: Withdraw the potential offer of a Knighthood to Gavin Williamson due to gis failures whilst in charge of the Education Dept and the fact a party was hosted by his department during lockdown
